channel.title: [Approved] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-SDPI
channel.description:
The following addition to the IATI Organisation Identifier list has been proposed for Sustainable Development Policy Institute (SDPI)
No suitable registration code or agency has been found for this organisation.
**Code:** XI-IATI-SDPI **Name:** Sustainable Development Policy Institute (SDPI) **Description**: The Sustainable Development Policy Institute (SDPI) is an independent non-profit organization that serves as a forum for policy dialogue and provides policy advice to the government. Its research projects focus on five core areas: governance, environment, global and rural livelihoods, human development, and information and communications. **URL**: [www.sdpi.org](http://www.sdpi.org/)
Using the [org-id.guide](http://org-id.guide/) for the creation of the identifiers [for Pakistan](http://org-id.guide/results?structure=all&coverage=PK&sector=all) there are two agencies, but SPDI is not register with neither of them.
If no objection is received this XI-IATI code will be approved and added in a week.

item.title: [Approved] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-SDPI
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
There has been no objection to this code and it will be approved.

item.title: [Approved] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-SDPI
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
The following addition to the IATI Organisation Identifier list has been proposed for Sustainable Development Policy Institute (SDPI)

No suitable registration code or agency has been found for this organisation.

Code: XI-IATI-SDPI
Name: Sustainable Development Policy Institute (SDPI)
Description: The Sustainable Development Policy Institute (SDPI) is an independent non-profit organization that serves as a forum for policy dialogue and provides policy advice to the government. Its research projects focus on five core areas: governance, environment, global and rural livelihoods, human development, and information and communications.
URL: www.sdpi.org

Using the org-id.guide for the creation of the identifiers for Pakistan there are two agencies, but SPDI is not register with neither of them.

If no objection is received this XI-IATI code will be approved and added in a week.
